name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Clyde Ronald LOUGHARD, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Clyde Ronald LOUGHARD, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 16th day of March 1999, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED, limited to the issue of whether 18 Pa.C.S.A. §7329, Prohibition of certain types of entertainment on bottle club premises, violates the First Amendment freedom of expression. The application to supplement the petition for allowance of appeal is also granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
725 A.2d 174
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Clyde Ronald LOUGHARD, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 16, 1999.
